act:
1374444 THE CUSTOMS TARIFF (AMENDMENT) BILL 1985
(AS PASSED BY THE HOUSES OF PARLIAMENT) ACT NO. 8 OF 1986. [ 24th Jan, 1986]
A BILL further to amend the Customs Tariff Act 1975.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Thirty- sixth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1578651 1 Short title and commencement.
1991023 1This Act may be called the Customs Tariff (Amendment) Act, 1985.
1596187 2It shall come into for on such date as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
1085398 2Amendment of Act 51 of 1975. In the Customs Tariff Act, 1975, for the First Schedule, the following Schedule shall be substituted, namely:-
2 1 28- 2- 1986: Vide Notifn. No. z. s. r. 88 (E), dt. 15- 2- 1986.
